objects.name: Analytic 0994
objects.description: Monitor unified logs for processes spawned from Safari or other browsers that immediately load scripts or executables. Detect file drops in ~/Library/Caches or ~/Downloads that execute shortly after being written.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Child processes of Safari, Chrome, or Firefox executing scripting interpreters

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: File creation of unsigned binaries/scripts in user cache or download directories

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: NSM:Flow
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Content injection observed in HTTPS responses with mismatched certificates or altered payloads

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: macOS-specific directories where malicious payloads may be written.
